channel.title: Skilling & PKing or just PKing?
channel.description: I would like to know this for my upcoming server which is nearly done, so skilling & PKing or just PKing?

item.title: Skilling & PKing or just PKing?
item.dc:creator: @lolitrollu lolitrollu
item.description:
@lolitrollu wrote:

Just pking, skilling bores the shit out of me and is easily bottable, whereis pking isn’t. Plus, pking is pretty much the only thing I find enjoyable out of RSC servers, I don’t like staking or skilling.

Read full topic

item.title: Skilling & PKing or just PKing?
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

bamboozola:

Well i think both is great pking gets boring after awhile. Then people leave and other people come on and see 5-10 people on then they leave so i say both. but then again most server fail because of competition (RSCE) the main server out atm. But for sure id come play

Naw its only boring when you need to waste time grinding for supplies just to pk again. Thats all RSCE is, well not for the uber rich guys anyway. Thier the only ones out there pking constantly…doesnt get boring for them. So why would it be boring for everyone on a pking only server?

Read full topic

again everyone is entitled to their own…

But web based would create alot less GUI mayhem and pointless bars and blah blah blah…

item.title: Skilling & PKing or just PKing?
item.dc:creator: @_Riley1 ☺Riley☺
item.description:
@_Riley1 wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:17, topic:345219”][quote author=☺Riley☺ link=topic=441596.msg3244661#msg3244661 date=1277247367]

dude screw this vote make a pk server and all will come

That is an opinion, don’t assume things.

Simply pking (imo) would be fun at first, but would end up getting boaring, believe it or not, some people do actually like skilling smithing/fishing and all that fun stuff. So I vote for skilling+pking.

Lol adam, you always liked smithing xD.

Would you guys like a Peekay style point system with f2p gamestyle?

I’ve never heard of Peekay.

It was up 3 months then it slowly died, It was first called Christmas PeeKay, but after christmas it was just peekay, and by the peekay style point system i mean clientsided control panel. How come you haven’t heard of it, if it’s on first page of development section?
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427251.0.html

I haven’t touched a RSC server in months, so I didn’t care to view the thread. I wouldn’t use that source, it is all messy. I like the in-game CP idea, although there should be another on the website so that you have choice. As Kryptix stated in another thread, you shouldn’t host a server unless you are fully dedicated, meaning you will fork out the money for adverisement, hosts(s), DDoS migration, etc. You stated you’re ‘experienced’ in hosting from your home comp – I don’t believe you on that. I’m pretty sure if someone wanted to take you down, on your home comp, you would go down. (I know for a fact 5+ shells would give you hell, and that’s like $10)

All in all, don’t even attempt to put a server up unless you have a good $600 atleast to potentially waste on the server.
[/quote]

Not really what he wanted to know, and there is NOWAY he need 600usd to make it. there maby 1-3 person who can actually ddos if they wich and I don’t belive they care anymore unless you talking shit about them behind their back. DoS Is very eay to block. so there only way you can take down the server is thru the client.

Anyway; f2p, point system will own.[/quote]

I already answered in previous posts what he wanted to know. I was giving him feedback, as he was asking for it as well. He does WAY need $600+ if he wants to start it good, keep it up, advertise, etc. Anybody can DDoS, it’s quite simple. Heck, I’ve got a couple hundred shells on a few booters for XBL that I guarantee would hit his server offline if it’s on a cheap host without proper protection. Also, if people are stupid enough to DoS still, sitting on a dynamic IP and hitting your SQL would cause your server quite a bit of problems.

Read full topic

item.title: Skilling & PKing or just PKing?

item.description:

dude screw this vote make a pk server and all will come
[/quote]
That is an opinion, don’t assume things.

Simply pking (imo) would be fun at first, but would end up getting boaring, believe it or not, some people do actually like skilling smithing/fishing and all that fun stuff. So I vote for skilling+pking.

Lol adam, you always liked smithing xD.

Would you guys like a Peekay style point system with f2p gamestyle?

I’ve never heard of Peekay.

It was up 3 months then it slowly died, It was first called Christmas PeeKay, but after christmas it was just peekay, and by the peekay style point system i mean clientsided control panel. How come you haven’t heard of it, if it’s on first page of development section?
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427251.0.html

I haven’t touched a RSC server in months, so I didn’t care to view the thread. I wouldn’t use that source, it is all messy. I like the in-game CP idea, although there should be another on the website so that you have choice. As Kryptix stated in another thread, you shouldn’t host a server unless you are fully dedicated, meaning you will fork out the money for adverisement, hosts(s), DDoS migration, etc. You stated you’re ‘experienced’ in hosting from your home comp – I don’t believe you on that. I’m pretty sure if someone wanted to take you down, on your home comp, you would go down. (I know for a fact 5+ shells would give you hell, and that’s like $10)

All in all, don’t even attempt to put a server up unless you have a good $600 atleast to potentially waste on the server.[/quote]

Not really what he wanted to know, and there is NOWAY he need 600usd to make it. there maby 1-3 person who can actually ddos if they wich and I don’t belive they care anymore unless you talking shit about them behind their back. DoS Is very eay to block. so there only way you can take down the server is thru the client.

Anyway; f2p, point system will own.

Read full topic
